snippet: A Tibetan herder in China’s northwest Qinghai Province died Friday after setting himself on fire to protest government policies in the region.
abstract: Tibetan herder Tamdin Thar dies after setting himself on fire to protest against Chinese rule.
lead_paragraph: A Tibetan herder in China’s northwest Qinghai Province died Friday after setting himself on fire to protest government policies in the region.

headline.main: China: Tibetan Dies in Protest Fire
headline.print_headline: China: Tibetan Dies in Protest Fire
